messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] CORRECTION: Ned, censorship, list manners
messages.msgSnippet: ... That Klingon pet beastie? You re right, I don t think anyone wants to be targed. Joyce
messages.messageBody:
on 1/8/03 11:54 AM, SandraDodd@... at SandraDodd@... wrote:

> "target"
> not
> "targed"

That Klingon pet beastie? You're right, I don't think anyone wants to be

Joyce

messages.subject: CORRECTION: Ned, censorship, list manners
messages.msgSnippet: target not targed In a message dated 1/8/03 8:10:50 AM, FoxgloveStudio@aol.com writes:  Sherry, are you here to learn about unschooling, or are you
messages.messageBody:
"target"
not
"targed"

In a message dated 1/8/03 8:10:50 AM, FoxgloveStudio@... writes:

<< > Sherry, are you here to learn about unschooling, or are you here to
"save"
> us from the "nasty censors"?
>

<<I believe those two things to be one and the same... >>

I bet just about everyone her is on at least two homeschooling or unschooling
mailing lists, some are on five or ten. All have access to
www.unschooling.com, HEM's website, and the entire internet.

So who's your target "savee"?

Sandra
